title: Championship Riven Figure

embed.description: The Exile has returned. Throughout Worlds, the Championship Riven figure also includes a digital unlock of her in-game skin. Approximate Measurements: Height: 4.9 in / 12.4 cm Width: 3.8 in / 9.7 cm This

body: with the championship riven figure, which riven skin do you get. Is it the original championship riven from season 2 or is it the new championship riven from 2016?

replies.body: Cheers riot for clearing that up, i though it might of helped to clear things up a bit :)

welp, did they announce the figure before the skin was released?
Already bought the skin so now the value feels a bit less -.-"
The in game skin is the 2016 season. The only people that get the Season 2 championship riven are the players that had Championship Riven in season 2.
Are you aware by any chance of the pop vinyl figures coming out soon? I'd like to buy a renekton one or a Darius one if they're coming out!
that my friend.. is an excellent question! RITOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO where are youuuuuuuuuuuuuuu
